underspecified sentence: "The help should be accessible to the users both in the offline and online mode."
control sentence: The application must be usable in both offline and online modes.

underspecified sentence: "The solution should provide an interface for the user to log any defects or enhancement requests on the application and track thereafter."
control sentence: The system must offer a user interface for submitting and tracking defects or enhancement requests within the application.

underspecified sentence: "The solution should send alerts (e.g., email, SMS) to the user if the user chooses to whenever any action has been taken on the alert."
control sentence: The system should send alerts (e.g., email, SMS) to the user when the user has opted in, for any action taken on an alert.

underspecified sentence: "The solution should enable the user to track the submitted defect or enhancement request."
control sentence: The system must allow users to monitor the status of their submitted defect or enhancement requests.

underspecified sentence: "The solution should enable the help-desk user to view the reports on the submitted defects or enhancement requests category-wise, status-wise, and age-wise."
control sentence: The software must provide a feature that allows help-desk users to view defects and enhancement requests categorized, statused, and aged.

underspecified sentence: "The support solution should be accessible to the users both from within the application and also outside the application through a browser interface."
control sentence: The support solution must be accessible to users through both the application's interface and a web-based interface.

underspecified sentence: "Once the audit trail functionality has been activated, the System must track events without manual intervention, and store in the audit trail informationn about them."
control sentence: After enabling the audit trail feature, the System should automatically record events and store the related information in the audit trail without requiring manual intervention.

underspecified sentence: "The System must maintain the audit trail for as long as required, which will be at least for the life of the case to which it refers."
control sentence: The system must preserve the audit trail for the duration of the associated case.

underspecified sentence: "The System must ensure that audit trail data is available for inspection on request, so that a specific event can be identified and all related data made accessible, and that this can be achieved by authorised external personnel who have little or no familiarity with the system."
control sentence: The system must provide access to audit trail data for inspection upon request, enabling the identification and retrieval of specific events and related data, even for authorized external personnel with limited familiarity with the system.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to export audit trails for specified cases (without affecting the audit trail stored by the System). This functionality can be used by external auditors who wish to examine or analyse system activity"
control sentence: The System shall provide an export feature for specified audit trails, allowing external auditors to examine or analyze system activity without altering the System's stored audit trail.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to capture and store violations (i.e. A userâ€™s attempts to access a case to which he is denied access), and (where violations can validly be attempted) attempted violations, of access control mechanisms."
control sentence: The system must record and store instances of unauthorized access attempts to cases.

underspecified sentence: "The System must allow the user to limit access to cases to specified users or user groups."
control sentence: The System shall provide an access control feature that enables the user to restrict case access to designated users or user groups.

underspecified sentence: "The system should provide for role-based control for the functionality within the system."
control sentence: The system must implement role-based access control for its internal functions.

underspecified sentence: "The System must allow a user to be a member of more than one group."
control sentence: The System must support multiple group membership for users.

underspecified sentence: "The System must allow only admin-users to set up user profiles and allocate users to groups."
control sentence: Admin-users are the only users authorized to create and manage user profiles and user group assignments within the System.

underspecified sentence: "The System should allow a user to stipulate which other users or groups can access cases."
control sentence: The System must provide a feature that enables a user to specify access permissions for cases, either for individual users or user groups.

underspecified sentence: "The System must allow changes to security attributes for groups or users (such as access rights, security level, privileges, password allocation and management) to be made only by super-user."
control sentence: The system shall restrict modifications to security attributes (e.g., access rights, security level, privileges, password allocation, and management) to authorized super-users only.

underspecified sentence: "If a user performs a quick or advanced search, the System must never include in the search result list any record which the user does not have the right to access."
control sentence: The System shall exclude from search result lists any record that the user is not authorized to access, regardless of whether the search is quick or advanced.

underspecified sentence: "If the System allows users to make unauthorised attempts to access cases, it must log these in the audit trail."
control sentence: The System must log unauthorized access attempts to cases in the audit trail.

underspecified sentence: "Any access to cases, and all other activities involving the cases and related documents or data should also need to be stored in the audit trail to ensure legal admissibility and to assist in data recovery."
control sentence: All access to cases and related activities, including the manipulation of documents or data, must be recorded in the audit trail for legal admissibility and data recovery purposes.

underspecified sentence: "All error messages produced by the System must be meaningful, so that they can be appropriately acted upon by the users who are likely to see them. Ideally, each error message will be accompanied by explanatory text and an indication of the action(s) which the user can take in response to the error."
control sentence: Error messages generated by the System should be understandable and actionable, providing explanatory text and suggestions for user response.

underspecified sentence: "The System must employ a single set of user interface rules, or a small number of sets to provide a familiar and common look and feel for the application."
control sentence: The System should use a consistent user interface design, with a maximum of a few variations, to ensure a familiar and standardized appearance for the application.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to display several entities (cases, suspects) simultaneously."
control sentence: The System shall concurrently display multiple entities, including cases and suspects.

underspecified sentence: "The interfaces must be made customizable or user-configurable to the extent possible. (e.g., the displayed columns in the table, move, resize, modify the appearance). Such configurations must be saved in the user profile."
control sentence: The software should allow users to customize the interfaces, including adjusting the displayed columns, moving, resizing, and modifying the appearance of tables. These customizations should be saved in the user's profile.

underspecified sentence: "The System user interface must be suitable for users with special needs; that is, compatible with specialist software that may be used and with appropriate interface guidelines."
control sentence: The user interface of the System must be compatible with specialist software and adhere to appropriate interface guidelines for users with special needs.

underspecified sentence: "The System must provide End User and Administrator functions which are easy to use and intuitive throughout."
control sentence: The system shall offer both end-user and administrator interfaces that are user-friendly and intuitive.

underspecified sentence: "Frequently-executed System transactions must be designed so that they can be completed with a small number of interactions (e.g. mouse clicks)."
control sentence: System transactions that are frequently executed should be optimized to be completed with a minimal number of user interactions (e.g. mouse clicks).

underspecified sentence: "The user interfaces should be designed to make them user-intuitive."
control sentence: The user interfaces should be designed to be user-friendly.

underspecified sentence: "The user interfaces of the system should comply with Standard ISO 9241."
control sentence: The system's user interfaces must adhere to ISO 9241 standards.

underspecified sentence: "The System must provide adequate response times for commonly performed functions under both standard and peak conditions."
control sentence: The system should ensure that frequently used functions have acceptable response times under both normal and high-traffic conditions.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to perform a simple search within 5-8 seconds and a advanced search (multiple search criteria) within 10-15 seconds regardless of the storage capacity or number of cases in the system. In this context, performing a search means returning a result list. It does not include retrieving the records themselves."
control sentence: The system should return a result list for a simple search within 5-8 seconds and for an advanced search within 10-15 seconds, regardless of the system's storage capacity or the number of cases it contains. The search operation does not include retrieving the records themselves.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to retrieve and display within 5-8 seconds the case which has been accessed within the previous 2 months, regardless of storage capacity or number of cases in the system. This requirement is intended to allow for rapid retrieval of frequently-used cases, on the understanding that frequency of use is typically correlated with recent use."
control sentence: The system should retrieve and display a recently accessed case within 5-8 seconds, regardless of the system's storage capacity or the number of cases in the system, with the assumption that frequently used cases are typically those accessed within the previous 2 months.

underspecified sentence: "The System must be able to retrieve and display within 20 seconds the case which has not been accessed within the previous 2 months, regardless of storage capacity or number of cases in the system. This requirement is intended to allow for cases where cases used infrequently are stored on slower media than more active records."
control sentence: The system should retrieve and display the case that has not been accessed in the past 2 months within 20 seconds, regardless of the storage media or the total number of cases in the system.

underspecified sentence: "The System be scaleable and must not have any features which would preclude use xin small or large police stations, with varying numbers of cases handled."
control sentence: The system must be scalable to accommodate both small and large police stations, regardless of the number of cases they handle.

underspecified sentence: "The system should support multilingual interface."
control sentence: The system must provide a user interface that supports multiple languages.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be designed in manner that operational data is not lost in case of any failure of equipment or communication network."
control sentence: The system must ensure data persistence in the event of equipment or communication network failure.

underspecified sentence: "The system should work even in an offline mode with the critical functionality."
control sentence: The system must function with its essential features when operating offline.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be designed to have satisfactory performance even in Police Stations connected on low-bandwidth."
control sentence: The system must perform satisfactorily in Police Stations with low-bandwidth internet connections.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be implemented using Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and have a modular design."
control sentence: The system must be designed using a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and should have a modular structure.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be developed on Open Standards."
control sentence: The system must be developed using open standards.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be built on a common User Access and Authentication Service to ensure Single-Sign on for the end-user."
control sentence: The system must utilize a shared User Access and Authentication Service to implement Single-Sign on for users.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be developed for a centralized deployment and maintenance."
control sentence: The system must be designed for centralized deployment and management.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be developed to be deployed in a 3-tier datacenter architecture."
control sentence: The software must be designed for deployment in a three-tier datacenter structure.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be designed to have a n-tier architecture with the presentation logic separated from the business logic that is again separated from the data-access logic."
control sentence: The system design should incorporate an n-tier architecture, with the presentation logic, business logic, and data-access logic each being distinct and separate from one another.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be extensible to provide access to the interfaces through PDA’s and mobile data terminals."
control sentence: The system must be designed to allow access to its interfaces via Personal Digital Assistants (PDAs) and mobile data terminals.

underspecified sentence: "The system should adopt standardized formats and common metadata elements."
control sentence: The system must use standardized formats and incorporate common metadata elements.

underspecified sentence: "The system should be designed for access through browser-based systems and must impose minimal requirements on the client device."
control sentence: The system design must support access via web browsers, and it should impose minimal hardware and software requirements on the client device.

underspecified sentence: "The system must support multiple types of communication services for remote access."
control sentence: The system shall provide support for various remote access communication services.

underspecified sentence: "The system should have capability to support public access to a subset of data and functionality."
control sentence: The system must provide access to a specific set of data and functions for public use.

underspecified sentence: "The system should support multi-tier authentication where required."
control sentence: The system must implement multi-tier authentication when necessary.

underspecified sentence: "The system should support SSL encrypted connections."
control sentence: The system must establish secure connections using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

underspecified sentence: "The system should support secure virtual private network connections."
control sentence: The system must establish and maintain secure Virtual Private Network (VPN) connections.

underspecified sentence: "The system should use HTTPS as the communication protocol, i.e., HTTP over an encrypted secure socket layer (SSL)."
control sentence: The system must employ HTTPS as its communication protocol, which is HTTP transmitted over a secure SSL connection.

underspecified sentence: "The system should run on multiple browsers."
control sentence: The software must be compatible with multiple web browsers.

underspecified sentence: "The system should support selective encryption of the stored data."
control sentence: The system must provide an option to encrypt specific data items when storing them.

underspecified sentence: "The system should ensure secure transmission of data over the network and utilize SSL and 2-way digital signatures."
control sentence: The system must implement Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) for secure data transmission and employ two-way digital signatures for authentication.
